title: Lines Life Taught Me
subtitle: Sentences That Only Make Sense After Living
opening_text: This book introduces 99 sentences containing life wisdom. It provides insights needed in various situations we experience throughout life.
closing_text: May these sentences add a bit of wisdom to your life. Life is about learning through experience, and I hope these sentences help you understand that experience.
part1: Part 1. The Laws of Economy and Transaction: There's No Such Thing as a Free Lunch
part1_title: Part 1. Laws of Economy and Trade
chapter1_title: 1. There's No Such Thing as a Free Lunch
chapter1_text: Everything comes at a cost. Even things that appear free have a price paid somewhere.
chapter2_text: To gain great profits, you must take great risks. This is a fundamental principle of investment and life.
part2: Part 2. The Laws of Cause and Nature: Where There's Smoke, There's Fire
author: by Forest Kang
copyright: This book is the intellectual property of the author. Unauthorized reproduction and copying are prohibited.
dedication: Share your heart with someone you want to gift this to, in your name!
openingTitle: Complex World, The Power of Simple Truth
openingText: We live in a flood of information and complex theories every day. However, the real wisdom that has permeated human history for thousands of years has never been packaged in difficult or obscure words.
closingTitle: Doing the Right Things Right, Building a Forest of Wisdom
closingText: Now it's time for your wisdom to flow. Together, let's create a forest of wisdom for a better world.
